jd: Job Description -Position: PEGA Certified LSA - Job Location: Austin TX (Preferred), Memphis TN, St. Louis MO, or Morris Plains, NJ (Hybrid - 3 days/week onsite)Duration: 6month+MOI: SkypeVisa: USC/GC/GCEAD/H4EAD/OPT-EAD Required: Share resume, work auth copy and DL Work Eligibility: All Work Authorizations are Permitted - No Visa Transfers Key Technology: PEGA LSA, PRPC 5.x+, Java Required:More than 10 years of relevant experience in Pega developmentAdvanced knowledge of Pega PRPC 5.x/6.x/7.x.Familiarity with J2EE, XML, Java, JSP, and EJB.Familiarity with Scrum and Agile methodology.Knowledge of coding languages including Angular JS, Java, and JQuery.Knowledge of web technologies including JavaScript, CSS, HTML5, and XML.Excellent project management skills.Ability to troubleshoot complex software issues.Demonstrated experience in Agile development, application design, software development, and testingExpertise in object-oriented analysis and design across a variety of platformsExperience and thorough understanding of Pega RULES Process Commander System or other Business Process Management (BPM) systemAbility to effectively communicate to internal and external business partners on solution design Job Responsibilities:Design class structures, application frameworks, and data modelsBe responsible for building patient Profile Pega Application.Perform object-oriented analysis and design across a variety of platformsTroubleshoot application issues, coding bugs, and bottlenecks.Maintain the security of all system applications.Coordinate with the project team to ensure the business architecture matches the needs of the customer.Perform solution architecture within the Pega PRPC environment.Integrate business databases, legacy systems, and web services.
